name: NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Vincent T. DELLATORE, Faith Dellatore and Carlo Dellatore, Respondents

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Vincent T. DELLATORE, Faith Dellatore and Carlo Dellatore, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20th day of October, 1994, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and this matter is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Northampton County for reconsideration of its order dated April 24, 1992, in light of this Court’s opinion in Windrim v. Nationwide Insurance Company, 537 Pa. 129, 641 A.2d 1154 (1994).
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
650 A.2d 406
NATIONWIDE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Vincent T. DELLATORE, Faith Dellatore and Carlo Dellatore, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 20, 1994.
